body: It's alright but the "Ultimate Pussy" sounds dumb I'm sorry lol 6/10.

Wonder what will happen next for those two skins. Did the men put them in a closet? Or are they just thrown like that in a random room. What if someone finds them. What happens next? There’s those questions that pop up in my mind like that.
Its when the skinsuit is sentient/human turned into skinsuit that disturbs me lol when the skinsuit is just an artifical copy its fine personally.
It's kinda like bdsm, love it or hate it. I personally prefer the Scooby Doo disguise type rather than these living skinsuits.
I don't see how ANYONE can get turned on by skin suit's.....there are probably SOME people who do, but to me it's just creepy.
this is one of the weirdest i've seen
